title: Healthy penne with chicken and broccoli
description: Try griddling chicken rather than frying; it’s a healthier way of cooking and adds a great smoky flavour. This meal is low calorie  and if served as 3 portions provides 432 kcal, 36g protein, 49g carbohydrate (of which 7.5g sugars), 10.3g fat (of which 2.5g saturates), 12g fibre and 1.1g salt per portion.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for rubbing
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
